body:
https://godoc.org/golang.org/x/crypto/openpgp/packet#SymmetricallyEncrypted.Decrypt

"An incorrect key can, with high probability, be detected immediately and this will result in a KeyIncorrect error being returned."

I think this is as-good-as-it-gets with GPG, and you need an AEAD, like https://godoc.org/golang.org/x/crypto/nacl/secretbox to do better.
